Description.Text: Hotel Mirage is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation north of Milan. Highlights include onsite dining, free Wi-Fi and good transport links. Paderno Dugnano is a small town on the Lombardy plain north of Milan. Regional places of interest include the Monza Autodromo Nazionale (Grand Prix Circuit) and the spacious public gardens, Parco Nord. Palazzolo Milanese train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to the centre of Milan. The hotel occupies a modern low-rise property featuring a minimalist facade with prominent use of glass panelling. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a classic style with patterned fabrics and carpet, light walls and artwork above the bed. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. Ristorante Mirage serves international and Italian dishes in a friendly setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
